title: Sums up the front page of the boards for the last few months...

replies.body: Tis true, people can't accept what is good for then
http://atherys.com/forum/uploads/monthly_2016_04/KgqQRXA.gif.6f45985a93cd3ef555a28f867f121fa6.gif

http://www.deviantart.com/art/Kha-Zix-443198001

Change is good
https://media.giphy.com/media/FVER9pW85LHqM/giphy.gif

You say that, but it means I get a role that I can play, are wait times longer... Yes

But it is worth it

...

DQ is not champ select.
Repeat after me DQ is not champ select.
DQ is not champ select.



http://media.tumblr.com/tumblr_loze32BHKL1qzych1.gif

~~~~_DQ, is not a champ select, it's a que that allows the user to pre-select 2 roles which they favour and will have a higher likelihood of success in. 

Yes wait times are long, but patiences is a factor of success_
~~~~
**Edit: I apologize for my ignorance, I thought I knew it but was wrong, I will attempt to ensure I know what I am talking about more often from now**

http://i.imgur.com/mXyupD1.gif?noredirect 


DQ has nothing to do with that just an fyi...

That is the NEW champ select.

DQ is the premades being able to que with solos
http://i.imgur.com/WrKPhfd.gif"

To be fair dyna was implemented to make sure that queue times on the live servers wouldn't get ridiculous. so really, you can use them interchangeably if you want, one can't survive without the other.

> [{quoted}](name=macromite,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=puuA4lVP,comment-id=00000000000000000000000000010003,timestamp=2016-07-07T03:13:51.137+0000)
>
> To be fair dyna was implemented to make sure that queue times on the live servers wouldn't get ridiculous. so really, you can use them interchangeably if you want, one can't survive without the other.

Wow you are still confused. Check patch 6.2.

> Duo Queue is the 5 solo's vs a 5man premade who has superior comms. Trust me you're not going to have a good time.

Uhhh...no.

> As everyone else is saying, research your topic before you say anything. So you don't look 

Take your own advice.
You should try to actually know what you're talking about when trying to argue.

Granted I don't really have many friends to play with, but when we are together we are around the same rank and stuff so we climb together
I already follow that idea... Why are you trying to ingrain something that is already there?
Dynamic Queue is not good... at all...
terrible attempt at hypnotism is terrible

Dynamic Queue = Play with more than one extra person
New Champ Select = Pick your role
I understand my errors, thank you for your input though
